faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We plan to accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and other popular digital wallets. All payments are processed securely.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account page. Your access will continue until the end of the current billing period.

faqs.question: What happens if I cancel?
faqs.answer: If you cancel, you will retain access to all premium features until your current subscription period ends. After that, your account will be downgraded to the free plan.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Due to the nature of digital content, we generally do not offer refunds. However, if you have a special circumstance, please contact our support team.
